name: Monstermind (jeromiin)
description:
Monstermind

Do you like the Mastermind ? Do you like monsters ?

You can have both in Monstermind !

Originally I'm an iOS developer and making games is a dream for me. Video game is my passion, and I've always wanted to create one, so here it is.

And yes I'm so bad at making music that there isn't. Sorry !

Big thanks to my friend, pixel artist and also game developer for making the art for this game. Please go checkout his twitter: Calamarik and his games on itch.io

You can find me on twitter: jeromiin

Enjoy, don't hesitate to write comments to help me improve my skills.
